titleStmt.title: Ane admonition to the antichristian ministers in the deformit Kirk of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Burne, Nicol.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to N. Burne by STC.
Place of publication from and printer's name conjectured by STC.
Copy at reel 2084 lacks blank leaf.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
